page.title: 07Junior to Secondary School
page.content: In September nine of our class will be leaving our junior school, Corvedale C.E,to go to Secondary school at Ludlow.I am looking forward to it because it is a much bigger school and there is a canteen where you can choose your dinner. On June 18th 1985 all of us fourth years went for a day to Ludlow school.It was different to our school because the children all wore blue and black uniforms and had different teachers for each subject instead of having the same teacher to teach you all day. I thought it was a good school and the teachers were very strict.I am looking forward to going but I will miss my old friends. Sarah Lloyd age 11
